      • attemptMove

        public void attemptMove​(ChessCoordinates start,
                        ChessCoordinates end,
                        Piece promotion)
        Takes two coordinates, start and end from the user to move the piece. Also takes the third token for the promotion. Do the checks for the coordinates and perform the move. Alerts for the Check or final checkmate.
        Parameters:
        start - : The start coordinate of the piece to be moved.
        end - : The end coordinate for the piece to be moved at.
        promotion - : If promotion applied by the user, the token for the piece to be promoted to.

      • isPieceCollidingWithKing

        public boolean isPieceCollidingWithKing​(int rank,
                                        int file)
        Checks if a piece at a given rank and file is colliding with the king
        Parameters:
        rank - : Starting coordinated from the user
        file - : Ending coordinate of the move from the user.
        Returns:
        : Returns the true if the piece is colliding with the king, false otherwise.

      • isKingFirstCollision

        public boolean isKingFirstCollision​(ChessCoordinates start,
                                    ChessCoordinates end)
        Checks if a king is the first collision for given coordinates
        Parameters:
        start - : Starting coordinates
        end - : Ending coordinates
        Returns:
        : Returns the true if the king is the first collision, false otherwise.
